name: minecraft-skin-merger
description: A web application for merging Minecraft skins

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.ci-all: npm ci && npm ci --prefix client && npm ci --prefix server
scripts.build-all: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server

author: Spencer Frost
